colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES PA 'DI YANG RIGS BRGYA KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO SHR'I  DZNY'A NA BADZRA KYIS 'KHRUNGS RAB GSOL 'DEBS SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA, 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES PA'I BYANG PHYOGS HAL HA'I YUL DU KHU RAL CHEN MO SLOB DPON BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS, DGE BSHES ZLA DRANG SRONG RDO RJE BZANG PO, DGE TSUL BSTAN PA, K'AL TA T'A RI BSRUNGS @007A *, ,GANG DRANG SRONG RDO RJE SHOG GI SKU SKYES SLOB DPON SHRI GI THU YANG BYANG PHYOGS AA LIG SA nA T'IR SA SKYONG CHEN PO CHER SAR AA N'A KA'I DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS RJE SLI SKAL BZANG YON TAN, RI BO'I DGE RGYAS DGA' LDAN BSGYAN MDZES GLING GI T'A BLA MA BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN, KHAM TSAN SNYING RJE PAD DKAR GYI DGE BSGOS BLO BZANG 'OD ZER, DGE TSUL BSKAL LDAN SKYABS, DZA CHE GRVA THIL DPON TSE DANG LDAN PA, TSO'I CHE'U N'AG BDE SHIG ,SER SKYA THUN MONGS DAD LDAN SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS @006B GSER DNGUL MAndAL LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS PA BSKUL NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN CHOS KYI GRAGS PA BSTAN PA'I DPA' PHYUG DPAL BZANG POS GZIMS CHUNG BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI BKA' BCU SBYIN DAR MING CAN GYIS SO, ,)
